DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study show new assessment tool pelvic examination valid reliable .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Test New Pelvic Examination Assessment Tool
DOC.detailed_description: Physical examination pelvis important core skill medical student need acquire . However , due intimate nature student graduate unable perform competent pelvic examination . At present , evaluation medical student competence pelvic examination do subjective faculty assessment . This assessment typically perform end teach block base assessor ' recollection student ' performance . This kind assessment show poor validity reliability . This contrast objective structured assessment technical skill ( OSATS ) , use task specific global rating scale use evaluate wide range clinical surgical skill . However , study date evaluate assessment tool pelvic examination . In study investigator aim determine validity reliability OSATS pelvic examination . In addition , investigator aim identify factor influence score OSATS .
DOC.criteria: Final year medical student start Obstetrics Gynaecology placement Final year medical student finish Obstetrics Gynaecology placement Pre Royal College Obstetrics Gynaecology register junior doctor Obstetrics Gynaecology placement . Signed Consent Form â€¢ None
